gist.headline: Polishing the Hive
gist.blurb: Our App Showcase just got a major glow-up with AI-enhanced descriptions, a cleaner UI, and deeper metrics for creators.
gist.summary: Overhauled the App Showcase with a redesigned UI, automated AI description rewriting, and expanded metrics tracking for BYOP and request counts.
gist.impact: Users get a clearer view of community apps, while developers gain better insights into how their creations are being used.
gist.visual_concept: The bee mascot acting as a gallery curator. The 'App Showcase' is represented as a wall of pixel art frames. The bee is polishing one frame while holding a clipboard (representing the new metrics/descriptions).
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot acting as a curator in a digital gallery, polishing a framed pixel art painting. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Floating pixel UI panels show rising graphs and text blocks. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'SHOWCASE'. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, soft pastel gradients, warm lighting, retro gaming vibes.
